4.3.4 Composition functions

  • codimension-one-subspace
  • column
  • concatenate-grids
  • diagonal
  • drop
  • identity-matrix
  • matrix-from-columns
  • row
  • slice
  • stride
  • subgrid
  • transpose
  • Vector products

These functions transform or compose grids to make new grids.
